spell_tooltip.description:
Your Heroism spell now has a 60 sec. cooldown, but increases Haste by 20%, and only affects you and your friendly target when cast for 10 sec.

In addition, Heroism is no longer affected by Exhaustion.
Primordial Wave summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 46 yards by 15% for 15 sec.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 266,567 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 262,410 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 262,432 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 172,032 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 174,774 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 172,592 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

Generates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 187,800 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Chills the target with frost, causing 193,332 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Generates 3 Maelstrom.

Increases the movement speed bonus of Ghost Wolf by 10%.

When you have 3 or more totems active, your movement speed is increased by 15%.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 9 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 30% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 11 yards 50% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
Wind Rush Totem's movement speed bonus is increased by 10% and now removes snares.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 376,927 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 828,333 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of the target location to tremble and break, dealing 325,100 Physical damage over 6 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

This spell is cast at a selected location.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind at your enemies for 24 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning increases your haste by 4%, stacking up to 4 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.
Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake have a 25% chance to refund all Maelstrom spent.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, or Chain Lightning has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 Icefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 576,886 Frost damage and causing your next Frost Shock to deal 200% increased damage, damage 4 additional targets, and generate 7 additional Maelstrom.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Charge yourself with lightning, causing your next 2 Lightning Bolts to deal 150% more damage, and also causes your next 2 Lightning Bolts or Chain Lightnings to be instant cast and trigger an Elemental Overload on every target.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a damaging Nature and Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.
Your next Chain Lightning or Lightning Bolt has 30% reduced cast time after casting Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake. Can accumulate up to 2 charges.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.
Casting Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 12 sec.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Increases Earth Shock and Earthquake damage by 8% and the stat bonuses granted by Elemental Blast by 25%.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 40%.
Your damaging spells incite the earth around you to come to your aid for 6 sec, repeatedly dealing 37,798 Nature damage to your most recently attacked target.

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 12 sec.

Blast all targets affected by your Flame Shock within 45 yards with a Primordial Wave, dealing 959,037 Elemental damage, and granting you Lava Surge.

Generates 12 Maelstrom.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake can trigger your Mastery: Elemental Overload at 50% effectiveness.

Overloaded Earthquakes do not knock enemies down.
Your haste is increased by 20% while Ascendance is active and its duration is increased by 3 sec.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional targets blasted by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.

Each Maelstrom spent has a 0.12% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 18 sec, instantly casting a Flame Shock and a 100% effectiveness Lava Burst at up to 6 nearby enemies.

While ascended, Elemental Overload damage is increased by 150% and spells affected by your Mastery: Elemental Overload cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 107,310 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 9 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.8 sec for 6 sec, dealing 51,848 Fire damage to all enemies within 9 yards.

Generates 8 Maelstrom.
Primordial Wave calls an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec. Whenever you cast a healing or damaging spell, the Ancestor will cast a similar spell.
Ancestors have a 20% chance to call another Ancestor for 6 sec when they depart.
Lightning Bolt, Lava Burst, Chain Lightning, Icefury, and Frost Shock casts have a 8% chance to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.
Lava Burst gains an additional charge and deals 5% increased damage.
When an Ancestor is called, they reduce the cooldown of Fire Elemental and Storm Elemental by 5 sec.
Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 25.
Using spells with a cast time increases the duration of Spiritwalker's Grace and Spiritwalker's Aegis by 1 sec, up to a maximum of 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Nature's Guardian by 15 sec and causes it to heal for an additional 10% of your maximum health.

Increases the damage of Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake by 15%.

Increases the healing of Healing Surge and Chain Heal by 25%.
When an Ancestor departs, they cast Elemental Blast at a nearby enemy.

Your next healing or damaging spell is instant, costs no mana, and deals 10% increased damage and healing.

If you know Nature's Swiftness, it is replaced by Ancestral Swiftness and causes Ancestral Swiftness to call an Ancestor to your side for 6 sec.

Lightning Bolt: Your next cast will cause 1 additional Elemental Overload.

Chain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

Frost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
